item.title: Compiling error(help)
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

change your compiler code to this:

@echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles(x64)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x64)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

that will work

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error(help)
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

Well if your running windows 7 or vista try this:

@echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles(x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

And if that doesnt work search your program files for your Java and if it’s there then idk what’s wrong =p

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error(help)
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

okay when ever i post my compiling errors in the right spot no one helps me so ima post here okay. When ever i compile it says i dont have the java witch i do. The only thing it lets me compile is the items in the shops but it doesnt show it but it does when i compile it says this

You do not have java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

@echo off
@TITLE Reality’s Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
and the code is

Read full topic
